Construct vertices on a circle through three points in space

Parameters:
res - the number of points on the circle
Returns:
a list of points on the circle through the given three points, eavenly spaced and sorted

getCircle

public static java.util.List<javax.vecmath.Point4d> getCircle(javax.vecmath.Point4d center,
                                                              javax.vecmath.Point4d normal,
                                                              javax.vecmath.Point4d point,
                                                              int res)
Returns points on the circle when (center - point) perpendicular to normal

Parameters:
center - the center of the circle
normal - the normal of the circle
point - a point on the circle
Returns:
list of points on the circle, point is not neccessarily contained
